MAMAExpDLL mama_status mamaConnection_free ( mamaConnection  connection  ) 

This class contains information regarding outbound connections for per/connection conflation.

Free the connection.

Parameters:
[in] connection The mama connection
Returns:
mama_status return code MAMA_STATUS_OK

MAMAExpDLL mama_status mamaConnection_getPort ( mamaConnection  connection,
uint16_t *  port 
)

Return the port of the connected client.

This will usually be an ephemeral port selected by the client's ip stack.

Parameters:
[in] connection The mama connection
[out] port Returning the associated port
Returns:
mama_status return code can be one of: MAMA_STATUS_NULL_ARG MAMA_STATUS_OK
